original_text: The false teachers tell these believers to do whatever they want to do. They promise that this will make them really free. But the false teachers themselves are not free. Instead, they are like slaves. They cannot stop doing the bad things that will destroy them. We know that if something has power over a person, then that person is its slave.
korean_text: 그들에게 자유를 준다 하여도 자신들은 멸망의 종들이니 누구든지 진 자는 이긴 자의 종이 됨이라

sentences.original_text: The false teachers tell these believers
to do whatever they want to do
They promise that this will make them really free
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이것이 그들을 정말 자유롭게 만들 것이라고 약속합니다

sentences.original_text: But the false teachers themselves are not free
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 거짓 교사들 자신들은 자유롭지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: They cannot stop doing the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나쁜 것들을 하는 것을 멈출 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: We know that if something has power over a person
sentences.korean_translation: 무언가가 한 사람에게 힘을 가지고 있다면

sentences.original_text: then that person is its slave
